name: Neon Jelly Rush
description:
Swipe your finger to move the white character cube and stay away from those nasty neon jellies. What is your best score?

Enjoy the game.

Features:

▶ MANOEUVRE around avoiding neon jellies

▶ ENDLESS challenge: Play forever and try to beat your friend's top score with Game Center!

▶ FREE download plus everything can be earned easily without any purchases (in-app purchase optional)

▶ iOS 11.x and iPhone X supported!
